extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Rails Lasers

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: fr_FR

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: fr_FR

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: fr_FR

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: fr_FR

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: en_US
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: fr_FR

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Here we are!\. A new area for us Seekers to explore!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Nous y voilà !\. Une nouvelle zone à explorer pour les \v[lore.title.seeker]s !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Woah!\. More beach!\. Awesome!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ouah !\. Encore une plage !\. Fantastique !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Seems like a fancy vacation spot, just filled with weird creatures.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: On dirait un lieu de vacance paradisiaque, mais rempli de créatures bizarres.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: This almost feels like Instatainment is trying to expand into the resort business.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: On dirait presque qu'Instatainment essaye d'étendre ses activités au tourisme.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Really reminds me of our last vacation, right Polly?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ça me rappelle nos dernières vacances, pas vrai, Polly ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Right... it's not that far off.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui... c'est pas très différent.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Really reminds me of my last vacation with Polly...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ça me rappelle vraiment mes dernières vacances avec Polly...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Maybe it's just me, but doesn't all that water seem...\. dangerous?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Peut-être que c'est juste moi, mais cette eau ne serait pas un peu...\. dangereuse ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Explore \c[3]Azure Archipelago\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Explorez l'\c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Dear Seeker, welcome to \c[3]Azure Archipelago\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Chez \v[lore.title.seeker], bienvenue à l'\c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: This location has just recently been discovered and made fully accessible to Operation Trackwalker!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ce lieu vient tout juste d'être découvert et d'être rendu entièrement accessible à l'Opération Retraçage !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Your objective is to explore the area and reach the \c[3]temple\c[0] located in the \c[3]center of the archipelago\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Votre objectif est d'explorer la zone et d'atteindre le \c[3]temple\c[0] situé au \c[3]centre de l'archipel\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Be prepared as the Track of the Ancients holds another challenge for those reaching their destination.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Soyez prêts, car le \v[lore.title.track-of-ancients] a préparé encore un autre défi pour ceux qui atteindront leur destination.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Reach the \c[3]temple\c[0] in the center of \c[3]Azure Archipelago\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Atteingnez le \c[3]temple\c[0] situé au centre de \c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Dear Seeker, welcome to \c[3]Azure Archipelago\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Chez \v[lore.title.seeker], bienvenue à l'\c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Good luck on reaching the \c[3]temple\c[0] in the center of the archipelago!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bonne chance pour atteindre le \c[3]temple\c[0] situé au centre de l'archipel !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Another checkpoint!\. Where is the treasure?!\. Ancients, I demand a treasure!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Encore une autre étape !\. Où est le trésor ?!\. Chers Anciens, je demande un trésor !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Another checkpoint?!\. We just went all the way back to where we started!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Encore une étape ?! On est revenu là où on a commencé !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: So...\. this is it?\. Right back to the entrance?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Donc...\. Ça y est ?\. On est de retour à l'entrée ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Another checkpoint...\. Please, no more checkpoints.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Encore une étape...\. S'il vous plait, j'en peux plus...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Weeee diiiiiid iiiiiit!\. Finally!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Finiiiiiii !\. Enfin on a fini !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: It seems we just beat the king of all jumping puzzles!\. Let's hope the reward is worth it!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: On dirait qu'on a battu la quintessence de tous les puzzles de sauts !\. Espérons que la récompense en vaille la peine !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Treasure...\. we finally found...\. the treasure!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Le trésor...\. on a enfin trouvé...\. le trésor !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Finally!\. Seriously, we just backtracked the whole fricking area just to get to this treasure!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Enfin !\. Non mais sérieux, on a refait le tour entier de la zone juste pour avoir ce trésor !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: This treasure can't possibly be worth the trouble to get here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: C'est pas possible que ce trésor vaille tous les efforts qu'on a dû faire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Seriously!\. This took forever!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Non mais sérieux !\. Ça a pris une plombe !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Alas, the Ancients offer us a reward hopefully worth all the struggle.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: La récompense des anciens...\. Enfin ! Voyons si cela en valait la peine.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yessss!\. Beach area!\. This is the best!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ouaiiiis !\. La plage !\. C'est la meilleure zone !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hell yeah, man!\. This vacation has been way overdue!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: C'est clair, mec !\. Ces vacances étaient mérités depuis longtemps !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Come on, guys!\. Let's explore!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Allez les gars !\. On va explorer !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hey man, just chill for a moment, okay?\. We want to enjoy this!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Hé mec, détends-toi un peu, OK ?\. Laisse nous en profiter !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Here we offer a small selection of \c[3]new weapons and armor\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ici nous offrons une petite sélection de \c[3]nouvelles armes et amures\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: For more advanced equipment, revisit our \c[3]main store\c[0] in the \c[3]Shopping District of Rhombus Square\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Pour du équipement plus avancé, revisitez notre \c[3]magasin principal\c[0] dans le \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.landmark.name.shops] de \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Mysterious Guardian
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Gardien Mystérieux
... S-salut ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker]. I am the guardian of this peaceful island. Long have I been undisturbed.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \v[lore.title.seeker]. Je suis le gardien de cette paisible île. Depuis longtemps je n'ai jamais été dérangé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: But now, humans have come and are crawling all around me, left and right.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Mais maintenant, les humains sont arrivés et grouilles tout autour de moi, à droite à gauche.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: ... S-sorry?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: ... D-désolé ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hoho, you misunderstand!\. This is exciting!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Hoho, vous m'avez mal compris !\. C'est réjouissant !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Finally, opponents for me to challenge. No more sitting around with nothing but fishing to pass the time!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Enfin, des adversaires à défier. Plus besoin de languir assis avec seulement la pêche pour seul loisir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], do me the honor and meet me in combat.\. I shall gladly test your abilities.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], faites moi l'honneur de me provoquer au combat.\. Je me ferais un plaisir de tester vos capacités.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: HA, splendid!\. I will gladly await your challenge, young one!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ha, splendide !\. Je vais attendre votre défi avec joie, jeune dame !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: What?\. And you call yourself a \v[lore.title.seeker], human?\. Certainly not a \v[lore.title.seeker] of challenges!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Quoi ?\. Et vous vous dites \v[lore.title.seeker], humain ?\. Certainement pas un \v[lore.title.seeker] de défis !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Sorry...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Désolée...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hi!\. Meet!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Salut !\. Rencontrer !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker]. Are you ready to face me?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \v[lore.title.seeker]. Êtes-vous prête à m'affronter ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Good!\. The time has finally come!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bien !\. Le temps est enfin venu !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: We shall hold our epic battle in an undisturbed arena
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Nous devons mener notre combat épique dans une arène vierge de toute perturbation

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Where?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Où ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: You will see.\. But for now\..\..\..\. Hold on tight!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Vous verrez.\. Et maintenant\..\..\..\. Accrochez-vous !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: And off we go!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Et on s'en va !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I see.\. You want to prepare yourself.\. So be it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je vois.\. Vous voulez vous préparer.\. Qu'il en soit ainsi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: But don't leave me waiting much longer.\. I already endured half an eternity without challenge.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Mais ne laissez pas trop attendre.\. J'ai déjà enduré une demi-éternité à attendre un défi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Bye...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bye...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \c[2][Yes, start the battle]\c[0]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \c[2][Oui, démarrer le combat]\c[0]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yes, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. That was a splendid fight!\. I haven't felt so alive in ages!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. C'était un combat formidable !\. Je ne me suis jamais senti aussi vivant depuis des lustres !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: But now I will take another rest and savor the sun.\.\.\. I mean\..\..\.. Guard this island, of course.\. Goodbye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Mais maintenant je vais me reposer et prendre un bain de soleil.\.\.\. Je veux dire\..\..\.. Protéger cette île, bien entendu.\. À plus !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: ... Bye.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: ... Bye.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Here we offer a small selection of \c[3]new weapons and armor\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ici nous offrons une petite sélection de \c[3]nouvelles armes et amures\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: For more advanced equipment, revisit our \c[3]main store\c[0] in the \c[3]Shopping District of Rhombus Square\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Pour du équipement plus avancé, revisitez notre \c[3]magasin principal\c[0] dans le \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.landmark.name.shops] de \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0].
